about.introLine1: I prioritize user experience and value a culture of growth through collaboration.
about.introLine2: I'm Grace Kim, a frontend developer.

card1.title: üí° User-Centered Experience
card1.description: To provide an intuitive and engaging user experience, I always start development by <highlight>thinking deeply about UI/UX</highlight>. I prioritize delivering a consistent interface across various devices and am well-versed in responsive web design and accessibility-focused UI planning.

card2.title: ü§ù A Culture of Growth Together
card2.description: I value a culture of growing together through knowledge sharing and teamwork. I‚Äôve led planning and operations with various members in activities such as <highlight>9oormthon Univ</highlight> and internal hackathons.

card3.title: üöÄ Challenge and Growth in Technology
card3.description: I feel <highlight>curiosity and excitement</highlight> rather than fear when learning new technologies. I continuously explore and adapt to the evolving development landscape, including modern frontend technologies and AI tools.

activity.description:
I believe in building ecosystems where code and people thrive together.

The process of sharing my passion for tech and pioneering new opportunities has solidified my foundation as a developer.
